title: I feel highly depressed from the game
body:
I am not the only one get abused by teammate. We supposed to enjoy the game, and I spend lots money and time to play that, but now I found I am highly depressed, I feel I am useless, I feel I cant even relax in a game, I feel rage. I will see my doctor. Please ban these people, they are destroying the game !! AFK might because the bad internet, but abused and curse?  Here is some screenshot I made last game. Please, please ban these people!!!!!  please let us know these people get banned !

best regards.

replies.body:
I get abused in game. At least once a week. OCE is probably one of the most toxic environments I have played in, including other online games.
All you can really do is report post-game and wait for it to go to tribunal, etc. and whatever.
There is also the in-game mute if you don't like what someone is saying.

And also...
____
> [{quoted}](name=Itstomuhohh,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=r4paL6gE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-06T16:28:45.776+0000)
>
> %%%% your doctor get some coaching fact is you do probably suck if you cant handle it then sure quit the game.

**THIS** should be discouraged. If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all.

Rito plz.

I think every players need to react when you get so offended, we need let the RIO see it is a big problem ! please share some your idea with theses. 

 Love the game, love ourselves!

I feel kinda the same, tbh. 
Just finished an ARAM game (I mostly play bots matches because they're less toxic) where our team was crushed and during the match one of their players was harping on about how they'd beat me in a 1v1 (no kidding - I mostly play bots matches) and how they were going to %%%% my mother.

I don't need that from random people in a video game. I don't need that from ANYONE.
Once the match ended, I was just glad to be out of there - but in doing so I forgot to report them in the post-match window, and I don't know how else to do it.
They're on my block list now (along with their friend who commented how "salt" we were), which is a start I guess. But I don't want to have to deal with this *at all*, and because I %%%%ed up and didn't report it kinda feels like they got away with it.

I play for fun, but when I play a match and feel worse afterwards than before I began... what's the point?

Reporting players for abusive language should be done in game, not on the boards. The game client has all the tools you need to do that. Believe me, if these people are truly being toxic then they will be warned.

If you were so severely offended that you don't believe that's enough, you may make a ticket and send it to player support.

And read [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) before posting again.
%%%% your doctor get some coaching fact is you do probably suck if you cant handle it then sure quit the game.
This sort of behaviour should not be tolerated. You should not encourage it, either.

Yeah, I understand that, and I also really hate these people!  I suggest RIO make a player ban list to warn these people, maybe one a week?

I will so pleased we all enjoy the friendly game. Please RIO, take the action!
